title: Can anyone recommend some handwritten-type fonts?
content:
Something not fancy but more sharp and edgy...I was thinking along the lines of this picture:

[http://www.theaspectratio.net/scorsesepersona.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042352/http:/www.theaspectratio.net/scorsesepersona.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042352im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scorsesepersona_4002.jpg)

If anyone wants to add on or suggest fonts, it would be greatly appreciated...

-Regards

author: FranklinDemi

comments.content: That script was actually written by hand, but here’s a list of [legible, natural handwriting fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025042352/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/contemporary-handwriting-fonts/).
…which, by the way, is the best way to do “handwritten-type” typography… Actual handwriting. =)
